about_the_game:
This is a simple motorcycle racing game.

Here, everything is about winning. Grab your weapons and sweep everyone off the road into the trash, or rule with speed and outpace everyone.

Racing Showdown, Battle with Friends

  • Explore endless levels, each with a unique style and theme, offering a fresh and thrilling experience.

  • Drive a variety of amazing racing cars to defeat opponents on the track and write your own racing legend.

  • Supports two players competing in the same arena, challenging each other to see who can stand out and who will be the "lucky" last place.

Diverse Vehicles, Abundant Weapons

  • From powerful long-range weapons to agile close-combat tools, and vehicles with varying speeds and endurance, each combination offers a fresh gaming experience waiting for you to explore.

  • Choose your vehicle and weapons according to your personal preferences, ensuring that every race is a unique and exclusive experience, both in appearance and performance.

Customize Freedom, Personalized Racing

  • From the futuristic tech vibe of alien skins to the primal strength of lizardman skins, a variety of unique character skins await your unlocking. Each skin comes with its corresponding theme story, adding more vibrancy to your racing journey.

  • Enemies in the game will also appear in diverse forms, ensuring that every race is filled with freshness and unpredictability.

  • Come on, personalize your racing experience. Whether you're slyly advancing as a streetwise rascal or making a dazzling sprint as an alien, show off your one-of-a-kind style and stand out on the track.

Push the Limits, Conquer the BOSS!

  • As you progress through the levels, more themes will be gradually unlocked.

  • Boss battle levels await your challenge, with each boss presenting a unique challenge.

  • The endless number of levels tests your limits, and every challenge offers new possibilities.

name: Motor Racing Battle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 / AMD Radeon R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/Windows11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space

short_description: This is a thrilling and challenging motorcycle combat game. In this world, speed and power are the keys to victory. You can choose to surpass all opponents with excellent driving skills, or arm yourself and use various weapons to sweep the enemies on the road into the trash pile.
